name: TableRowCollection
description: Represents a collection of all the rows that are part of the table.

properties.name: count
properties.description: Returns the number of rows in the table.

methods.name: getCount
methods.description: Gets the number of rows in the table.

methods.name: getItemAt
methods.description: Gets a row based on its position in the collection.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index value of the object to be retrieved. Zero-indexed.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds one or more rows to the table. The return object will be the top of the newly added row(s).
methods.signature: add(index: number, values: (boolean or string or number)[][])

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Optional. Specifies the relative position of the new row. If null or -1, the addition happens at the end. Any rows below the inserted row are shifted downwards. Zero-indexed.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Optional. A 2-dimensional array of unformatted values of the table row.
